abstract: In the end — as in the beginning, it must be said — the fate of Dow Jones will likely come down to the Bancrofts. But handicapping the vote is an exceedingly tricky matter.
lead_paragraph: In the end — as in the beginning, it must be said — the fate of Dow Jones will likely come down to the Bancrofts. But handicapping the vote is an exceedingly tricky matter.

headline.main: Dow Jones Pact Puts Family Back in Focus
